channel.title: Gitbook on Yuanye Ma's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gitbook on Yuanye Ma's Blog

item.title: gitbook部署
item.author: yuanye.ma@qq.com (Yuanye Ma)
item.description: 使用gitbook记笔记 $ sudo apt update $ sudo apt install nodejs npm $ nodejs --version v10.19.0 $ npm config set registry http://registry.npm.taobao.org/ # 设置npm源为淘宝的源 # 设置回官方的源 npm config set registry http://registry.npmjs.org/ $ sudo npm install gitbook-cli -g 常用命令 git clone blog
